mapper.insert: insert into p_basic_act (id_, ACT_NAME, DEPT_ID, ACT_NO, ACT_ENROL_START_TIME, ACT_ENROL_END_TIME, ACT_START_TIME, ACT_END_TIME, ACT_CONTENT, ACT_PLACE,STORAGE_TIME,CONTYPE,ACT_CANCLE_TIME,ACT_PEOPLE_NUMBER,ACT_STUDENT_NUMBER,ACT_TEACHER_NUMBER) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actEnrolStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actEnrolEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{storageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{conType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{actCancleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{actPeopleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{actStudentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actTeacherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update p_basic_act set ACT_NAME = #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_ID = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_NO = #{actNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_ENROL_START_TIME = #{actEnrolStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACT_ENROL_END_TIME = #{actEnrolEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACT_START_TIME = #{actStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACT_END_TIME = #{actEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACT_CONTENT = #{actContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_PLACE = #{actPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_CANCLE_TIME=#{actCancleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACT_PEOPLE_NUMBER=#{actPeopleNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_TEACHER_NUMBER=#{actTeacherNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_STUDENT_NUMBER=#{actStudentNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id_, ACT_NAME, DEPT_ID, ACT_NO, ACT_ENROL_START_TIME, ACT_ENROL_END_TIME, ACT_START_TIME, ACT_END_TIME, ACT_CONTENT, ACT_PLACE, STORAGE_TIME, CONTYPE,ACT_CANCLE_TIME,ACT_PEOPLE_NUMBER,ACT_STUDENT_NUMBER,ACT_TEACHER_NUMBER from p_basic_act where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id_, ACT_NAME, DEPT_ID, ACT_NO, ACT_ENROL_START_TIME, ACT_ENROL_END_TIME, ACT_START_TIME, ACT_END_TIME, ACT_CONTENT, ACT_PLACE, STORAGE_TIME, CONTYPE,ACT_CANCLE_TIME,ACT_PEOPLE_NUMBER,ACT_STUDENT_NUMBER,ACT_TEACHER_NUMBER from p_basic_act
